student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a Q&A exercise, by Discussing exercise routines with 'enjoy + ing', using, for example, 'I enjoy eating, I enjoy doing, I enjoy going…'. conversation.content: Hello! I enjoy playing basketball. What kind of sport do you enjoy?
I enjoy going to the gym. What do you enjoy doing on weekends?
I enjoy cycling on weekends. Do you enjoy swimming?
I enjoy swiming in the pool. What do you enjoy eating after exercise?
I enjoy eating fruits after exercise. Do you enjoy drinking water or juice after working out?
I enjoy drinking water after working out. What do you enjoy doing in the morning?
I enjoy jogging in the morning. Do you enjoy stretching before exercise?
I enjoy do stretching before exercise. What do you enjoy listening to while exercising?
I enjoy listening to music while exercising. It's great talking to you about exercise routines. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
